name: AvatarView
description: Circular avatar component with 4 view modes (Image, Initials, Bot, Saved) and 12 sizes from 160dp to 16dp. Supports gradient backgrounds for non-image modes and brand-aware theming.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Display mode: IMAGE (photo), INITIALS (text on gradient), BOT (bot icon on gradient), SAVED (bookmark icon on gray gradient)

properties.name: size
properties.description: Avatar size: SIZE_160, SIZE_120, SIZE_80, SIZE_56, SIZE_48, SIZE_40, SIZE_36, SIZE_32, SIZE_24, SIZE_20, SIZE_18, SIZE_16

properties.name: text
properties.description: Initials text (1-2 characters), used when type is INITIALS

properties.name: image
properties.description: Photo bitmap, used when type is IMAGE

properties.name: colorScheme
properties.description: Color scheme with gradient colors for each mode and content color

kotlinUsage:
val avatar = AvatarView(context)
avatar.configure(
    type = AvatarView.AvatarViewType.INITIALS,
    size = AvatarView.AvatarSize.SIZE_48,
    text = "AB",
    colorScheme = brand.avatarColorScheme(isDark)
)
